titles.title: Home of Your Own Act of 2025
Home of Your Own Act of 2025
To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a program to provide homeownership assistance grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
